## getCommaConditionAfterIfBlock() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Returns the condition in which a trailing comma is necessary after a given [IfBlock](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getCommaConditionAfterIfBlock(ifBlock: IfBlock): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

ifBlock


</td><td>

[IfBlock](./mapping-template-compose.ifblock.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

"true" if a trailing comma is always necessary, "false" if a trailing comma is never necessary.

## Remarks

ORs conditions of the then- and else-blocks.

The condition of the then-block: - ORs conditions of all the items in the then-block - ANDs the above with the condition of `ifBlock`

The condition of the else-block: - ORs conditions of all the items in the else-block - ANDS the above with the negated condition of `ifBlock`
